title: #89: Bitcoin to the Moon & 17 Million F Off’s | Dominic Frisby
description:
The guy that literally wrote the first book on Bitcoin stops by to explain the history of the cryptocurrency, why it all works the way it does, and where the value of the coin is heading.

Author, writer, thinker, singer, and entrepreneur Dominic Frisby, talks about his song “17 Million Fuck Off’s” about Brexit, and what it means for not just the UK but for all of Europe, that the deal has finally been put into place.

Dominic is proof that you can fight against the system while still having a good time doing it.

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
